sbb.osc.analog.description: Anti-aliased waveforms and noise oscillators with pulse-width modulation and hard sync.

sbb.osc.additive.description: An additive synthesis voice with parameters for number of partials, harmonic even/odd balance, harmonic decay, and more.

sbb.osc.karplus.description: A Karplus-Strong physical model for a plucked string.

sbb.osc.granular.description: A granular synthesis voice with pitch control.

sbb.osc.wavetable.description: A two-dimensional scanning, interpolating wavetable oscillator with oversampling for anti-aliasing.

sbb.osc.sampler.description: A basic sampler with one-shot and de-clicked looping modes

sbb.env.ad.description: An attack-decay envelope with built-in attenuator.

sbb.env.adsr.description: An attack-decay-sustain-release envelope with built-in attenuator.

sbb.mod.lfo.description: A low frequency oscillator with multiple shapes.

sbb.mod.rand.description: A signal-rate randomness source and a random sample-and-hold in one.

sbb.mod.seq.description: A simple step sequencer of arbitrary length.

sbb.util.sustain.description: A utility for sustaining held notes.
